means: [人名] [爱尔兰姓氏] 克龙 Cronin的变体

sentence.Network_en: It was said jokingly almost, in her grim, Italian, old crone fashion.
sentence.Network_cn: 说这些话时也差不多像是开玩笑, 是以她那独特的严峻的意大利型老大婆的方式在开玩笑.

sentence.Network_en: The old crone gabbed all day.
sentence.Network_cn: 这老太婆整天喋喋不休.

sentence.Network_en: Even if he is a youth of twenty he moves like an ancient crone.
sentence.Network_cn: 他即使是二十岁的青年,行动起来也象个干瘪的老太婆.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 高频lists 1~33 edited flashcards | Quizlet ... cringe 畏缩,谄媚,奉承 crone 干瘪老丑婆 crony 密友,亲伴,好朋友.
【食品词典】C15_专业词汇_专业英语_食品伙伴网 ... croaker 石首鱼；黄花鱼 crone 老母羊 crook 定形的雪茄烟.
十六级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... croft n. （住宅附近的） 小农场 crone n. 干瘪老太婆, 老母羊 crosier n. 权杖.
Dominions Wikipedia - Blood and Fire（血与火） ... Great Warlock（ 大术士） Crone（ 巫婆） Vampire Queen（ 吸血女王）.

This crone will not be hushed up any longer ., 这一罪行再也隐瞒不住了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: via Middle Dutch croonje, caroonje 'carcass, old ewe' from Old Northern French caroigne 'carrion, cantankerous woman' (see carrion)

entry.def: A crone is an ugly old woman.

auth_sentence.content: Toklas remains the dour ugly crone to Stein's handsome playful princess.
auth_sentence.res_content: Toklas remains the dour ugly crone to Stein's handsome playful princess.

auth_sentence.content: She can be a wailing banshee or some withered crone, but always vulnerable and distraught.
